original_text: then I will give you your rains in their season, and the land shall yield its increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 철따라 비를 주리니 땅은 그 산물을 내고 밭의 나무는 열매를 맺으리라

sentences.original_text: then I will give you your rains in their season
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 너희에게 때를 따라 비를 주겠습니다

sentences.original_text: and the land shall yield its increase
and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 밭의 나무들은 그 열매를 맺을 것입니다
